title: Fuzzy Beginnings
content: Creation timelines for the standard lorem ipsum passage vary, with some citing the 15th century and others the 20th.

title: Meaning of Lorem Ipsum
content: Lorem ipsum was purposefully designed to have no meaning, but appear like real text, making it the perfect placeholder.

title: Usage and Examples
content: Lorem ipsum was popularized in the 1960s with Letraset's dry-transfer sheets, and later entered the digital world via Aldus PageMaker.

title: Controversy in the Design World
content: Some claim lorem ipsum threatens to promote design over content, while others defend its value in the process of planning.

title: When to Use Lorem Ipsum
content: Generally, lorem ipsum is best suited to keeping templates from looking bare or minimizing the distractions of draft copy.

title: Lorem Ipsum All the Things
content: Coming full circle, the internet's remixing of the now infamous lorem ipsum passage has officially elevated it to pop culture status.

title: Leverage Agile Frameworks
content: Leverage agile frameworks to provide a robust synopsis for high level overviews. Iterative approaches to corporate strategy foster collaborative thinking to further the overall value proposition. Organically grow the holistic world view of disruptive innovation via workplace diversity and empowerment.

title: Focus Group
content: It's a simple lift and shift job get six alpha pups in here for a focus group, and high-level. On this journey obviously and nobody's fault it could have been managed better.

title: Ipsum Example 1
content: You are lucky to even be doing this for us make it pop. I'll pay you in a week we don't need to pay upfront i hope you understand can you make it stand out more?. I have an awesome idea for a startup, i need you to build it for me. Thanks for taking the time to make the website, but i already made it in wix could you move it a tad to the left we try your eye, but can you change everything?. It's great, can you add a beard though you are lucky to even be doing this for us.

title: Ipsum Example 2
content: Could you solutionize that for me there are more projects lined up charge extra the next time, and make it original. Thats not what i saw in my head at all can you turn it around in photoshop so we can see more of the front can you make it stand out more?.

title: Ipsum Example 3
content: Jazz it up a little I want you to take it to the next level we are a startup, nor the flier should feel like a warm handshake I have an awesome idea for a startup, i need you to build it for me can we have another option I know somebody who can do this for a reasonable cost. Can you lower the price for the website?

title: Ipsum Example 4
content: Could you do an actual logo instead of a font jazz it up a little, and can you please change the color theme of the website to pink and purple?

title: Ipsum Example 5
content: There is too much white space make it pop, can you lower the price for the website?

title: Ipsum Example 6
content: Can you make the blue bluer? can you use a high definition screenshot I really like the colour but can you change it, so theres all this spanish text on my site we exceed the clients' expectations i love it, but can you invert all colors?

title: Cheese Whiz
content: Do you like Cheese Whiz? Spray tan? Fake eyelashes? That's what is Lorem Ipsum to many—it rubs them the wrong way, all the way. It's unreal, uncanny, makes you wonder if something is wrong, it seems to seek your attention for all the wrong reasons. Usually, we prefer the real thing, wine without sulfur based preservatives, real butter, not margarine, and so we'd like our layouts and designs to be filled with real words, with thoughts that count, information that has value.

title: TV Dinner Pizza
content: The toppings you may chose for that TV dinner pizza slice when you forgot to shop for foods, the paint you may slap on your face to impress the new boss is your business. But what about your daily bread? Design comps, layouts, wireframes—will your clients accept that you go about things the facile way? Authorities in our business will tell in no uncertain terms that Lorem Ipsum is that huge, huge no no to forswear forever. Not so fast, I'd say, there are some redeeming factors in favor of greeking text, as its use is merely the symptom of a worse problem to take into consideration.

title: So Lorem Ipsum is bad (not necessarily)
content: There's lot of hate out there for a text that amounts to little more than garbled words in an old language. The villagers are out there with a vengeance to get that Frankenstein, wielding torches and pitchforks, wanting to tar and feather it at the least, running it out of town in shame.

title: WHEN THE FINAL COPY ISN’T READY YET
content:
Another common reason that graphic designers use dummy text is that the design work has commenced (such as a book or magazine layout) but the actual text is not available yet. 
 The good news is that there are loads of free lorem ipsum generator tools to choose from.

title: HELPING THE CLIENT FOCUS ON DESIGN
content: Website designers we spoke to confirm that when presenting clients with draft designs that include actual photos (instead of placeholder images) or actual text (instead of dummy text), clients immediately focus on the text or image selection and begin asking questions about those.

title: WHY DO GRAPHIC DESIGNERS USE LOREM IPSUM?
content: A key reason graphic designers use dummy text is to present draft designs which focus the eye on layout and visual design, not on the text itself. By using unrecognizable text (in this case a garbled form of Latin) someone viewing a design mockup will not be distracted into reading the words. The text is muted so to speak, in order to highlight the design.
